dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.search
dt-option.summary: Text to show in the "perform search" button

type.description: Text that will be displayed in the button that is shown to perform a search, when required.

dt-option.description: When the `-init searchBuilder.liveSearch` option is disabled, SearchBuilder will show a button that must be pressed before the search will run. The text shown in that button can be customised using this option.

example.title: Show search button and set text
